articles.title: Leinster boss Leo Cullen hits out at EPCR over 'illogical' approach - Independent.ie
articles.description: Leinster head coach Leo Cullen has blasted Heineken Champions Cup organisers European Professional Club Rugby (EPCR) for what he believes is an “illogical” approach to settling called-off matches.
articles.content:

articles.title: EMA lists rare spinal condition as side effect of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 shot - Rappler
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency also recommends updating the product information for AstraZeneca's vaccine regarding rare blood clotting with a low platelet count following the first shot, to say fewer such side effects were observed after the second dose
articles.content:
A safety panel of the European drug regulator on Friday, January 14, recommended adding a rare spinal inflammation called transverse myelitis as a side effect of AstraZeneca’s COVID-19 vaccine.
